title: Visiting a Recluse with a Qin
description: scholar and servant walking on shoreline with backs to viewer; servant wears 2 piece outfit and carries lute wrapped in white cloth; scholar walks several paces ahead, wears full length white robe, carrying walking stick; small, bent pine tree at left side; tall pine at right, extending to top of image; water is calm, beach has a few rocks
creditline: The Friends of Bruce Dayton Art Acquisition Fund
